review: I bought this looking for an upgrade from an older Roku box that I've been using for some years now. I was immediately impressed. Installation is a breeze and only took about 5 mins from the box to when I was able to start watching. I have limited space so I love that I don't have to have a box connected to my tv anymore. The picture is clear, the menu is easy to understand and everything works just fine. The price was already great, but I managed to grab this on Prime Day so I picked it up for a better price. I cut the cord on cable a whole ago, so it's important to me to have a reliable streaming service. I'm very pleased and impressed with this Fire Stick. It's out of sight, easy to use, and the games are fun as well lol. No regrets here!
